title: Subarticle B - Special Rules
content:
Subarticle B - Special Rules

State Regulations

Part 1015 - Attorneys (§ 1015.1 to 1015.19)

Part 1020 - INDIGENT CRIMINAL APPEALS MANAGEMENT PROGRAM (§ 1020.1 to 1020.13)

Part 1021 - Indigent Criminal Appeals Management Program (§ 1021.1 to 1021.2)

Part 1022 - Repealed

Part 1023 - Mental Health Information Services (§ 1023.1 to 1023.7)

Part 1025 - Repealed

Part 1028 - Medical Malpractice Panels (§ 1028.1)

Part 1029 - Licensing Of Legal Consultants (§ 1029.1 to 1029.8)

Part 1032 - Operation of Attorneys for Children Program (§ 1032.1 to 1032.7)

Part 1039 - Miscellaneous Rules (§ 1039.1 to 1039.2 to 1039.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 1015 - Attorneys (§ 1015.1 to 1015.19)

Part 1020 - INDIGENT CRIMINAL APPEALS MANAGEMENT PROGRAM (§ 1020.1 to 1020.13)

Part 1021 - Indigent Criminal Appeals Management Program (§ 1021.1 to 1021.2)

Part 1022 - Repealed

Part 1023 - Mental Health Information Services (§ 1023.1 to 1023.7)

Part 1025 - Repealed

Part 1028 - Medical Malpractice Panels (§ 1028.1)

Part 1029 - Licensing Of Legal Consultants (§ 1029.1 to 1029.8)

Part 1032 - Operation of Attorneys for Children Program (§ 1032.1 to 1032.7)

Part 1039 - Miscellaneous Rules (§ 1039.1 to 1039.2 to 1039.3)
